item.title: About me
item.author: fabioctba01@gmail.com (Fabio M. Lopes)
item.description:
I’m a Cloud Engineer based in Curitiba/Brazil, currently working at SERPRO.

A little bit about my history

I’m a generalist Site Reliability Engineer with 20+ years of experience with solid academic education in Computer Science, Computer Networking and Project Management. I have been responsible for ensuring the reliability of many different critical systems, reducing mean time to recovery, and improving incident response processes. I have also been instrumental in automating various tasks to reduce manual workloads and improve efficiency.
